sec.title: Acknowledgments
sec.p: The authors are grateful to Ursula Erikli for copy-editing, and to Yuxiao Tang, Cherine Bajali, and Lionel Martellet (Meningitis Vaccine Project, MVP) for excellent guidance and administrative support in facilitating access to the biological samples and accompanying data by agreement with PATH. The samples and previous data were collected in the course of the MenAfriVac trials supported by grants from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (to PATH). Publication costs were paid by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. This work was funded by the Wellcome Trust under the Department for International Development-Wellcome Joint Initiative on Research for Epidemic Preparedness (grant number 206534/Z/17/Z to CD).
